About Me

I am passionate about entering the semiconductor industry and becoming a successful hardware design and verification engineer.

Skills

  • FPGA Design
  • VLSI Design
  • Signal Processing
  • Communication Systems

Project description

  • Real-Time Stereo Image Rectification on FPGA: Developed and implemented a real-time stereo image rectification algorithm on FPGA using a model-based design approach. This project enhanced 3D vision system accuracy by aligning stereo images, essential for depth estimation.
  • Model-Based Design & FPGA Deployment: Utilized MATLAB/Simulink for algorithm modeling and automatically generated synthesizable VHDL code targeting Xilinx FPGA. This enabled rapid prototyping and real-time hardware validation.
  • Optimized for Embedded Vision Systems:Achieved high-throughput and low-latency performance suitable for embedded vision applications such as autonomous vehicles and robotic navigation, emphasizing reliability and computational efficiency.
